tns:meettheteamInterface.tns:meettheteamParagraph: Below is all the members of the team along with a small description of each member.

tns:member1.tns:member1Paragraph1: Hello I'm a Computer Engineer with a focus in Software Development. My hobbies include playing games, watching tv shows and developing Android Apps

tns:member2.tns:member2Paragraph2: I enjoy Web Develpment. I have worked with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, XSLT, XSD, and Xpath. Some hobbies I enjoy is I like to workout mainly doing calisthenics.

tns:member3.tns:member3Paragraph3: I enjoy Android App Develpment. I have created a simple math testing game called Math Shapers. It is currently in its pre alpha phase and only tests addition, subtraction and multiplication.

tns:member4.tns:member4Paragraph4: I enjoy working with Arduino. I used Arduino to develop a drop system for a concert. It was used to drop tickets from the ceiling.
